description.lang: This device is a smart light switch using 1 wire AC line.You can control the light from the remote.Input AC power : 220V

Z-Wave Plus LifelineProfile General = 0x00 Profile General Lifeline = 0x01 Command Class - Device Reset Locally Notification - Notification Report - Multilevel Sensor Report- Version Report- Configuration Report - Battery Report
OnOff Noti EP 1 rfile Notification = 0x71 Command Class - Notification Report
OnOff Noti EP 2rfile Notification = 0x71 Command Class - Notification Report
OnOff Noti EP 3 rfile Notification = 0x71 Command Class - Notification Report
This parameter determines the period in which the temperature and humidity values are transmitted.default Value : 0x258 (integer 600 --> 10 minutes)
If value is 0x258, The device reports temperature and humidity every 10 minutes.

name.lang: report value due to temperature change rate

description.lang: This parameter determines the amount of temperature change that must be reported.(Temperature Variation /0x14 (integer 20 -> 2.0C)In the receiving part, divide this value by 10 and treat it as one decimal place.)Default Value : 0x14Possible value : 0x0a ~ 0x1E
the value is set to 20 and If there is a change in temperature above 2 degrees, the temperature is reported regardless of the reporting period.

name.lang: report value due to humidity change rate

description.lang: This parameter determines the amount of humidity change that must be reported(Humidity Variation /0x0A (integer 10 -> 10%))Default Value : 0x0APossible values : 0x05~0x14
he value is set to 10 and If there is a change in humidity above 10 %, the humidity is reported regardless of the reporting period.
